page.title: 06PARKS IN DIDSBURY
page.content: Didsbury is well-supplied with parks.They are used for many kinds of recreation. { Fog Lane Park}has open fields,swings, animals to feed or watch,football, tennis and bowling facilities,and well laid out gardens.{Fletcher Moss Park has a large rockery containing many beautiful plants-some quite rare.{ } {Marie Louise Gardens}has fine specimen trees.{Didsbury Park}has a good selection of swings for children.There are large open spaces and sports facilities at{Ladybarn Park. All the parks are well-used and in many cases much loved.In crowded housing areas open spaces are very important to people.Dog owners are becoming more aware of the sanitary problems their pets cause in parks. This and vandalism are areas of concern yet to be resolved.
